title: About Pro Film Sound
intro: Pro Film Sound is owned and operated by international film and television sound mixer Adam Terrell, based in Moscow, Idaho just south of Spokane, Washington, USA.
body: Adam Terrell started his sound mixing and recording career running audio and recording church weddings. He then volunteered to run sound on a no-budget indie feature in 2011 and has since earned numerous referrals leading to his success in film and television production. Adam has done international documentary work, reality TV, and narrative film, and also has a fair share of solo work on micro-budget indie films.
